forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low around 50F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.
